org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value:
def sourcePath = 'C:\\Users\\Asus\\ApppiumApp\\Android.SauceLabs.Mobile.Sample.app.2.7.1.apk' def destinationPath = "${env.WORKSPACE}\\src\\test\\resources\\app\\"
// Copy the APK file using xcopy bat "xcopy /Y /I \"${sourcePath}\" \"${destinationPath}\""
def service = params.SERVICE bat """ set DEVICE_PORT=${params.DEVICE_PORT} docker-compose up --scale ${service}=1 """
